content:
Check:
  all:
    - context: DOMAIN
      name: RDOMAIN
      operator: is_not_valid_reference
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0374
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: RELREC.RDOMAIN must represent a dataset that is present in the study.
  in the study
Outcome:
  Message: RELREC.RDOMAIN does not represent a dataset present in the study
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Study
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0374
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'Two-character abbreviation for the domain of the
                  parent record(s). '
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: RDOMAIN
                Section: Related Records
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - RELREC

json.Description: RELREC.RDOMAIN must represent a dataset that is present in the study. in the study

Outcome.Message: RELREC.RDOMAIN does not represent a dataset present in the study
